name: 8-Beat
description:
Submission for Trijam #26 (https://itch.io/jam/trijam-26), Game developed in about 2 hours.

NOTE: Important to have the sound turned on.

The player must match the sequence of 8 bits (0 - 1) (https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bit) with the sounds that are being played at the beginning of each level.

  • Low note is for 0
  • High note is for 1

If the player do the right match, continues to the next level, if fails, begins at the first level.

First 10 levels are fixed but after that they are randomized.
